Dear customers, for your attention to this file, it will help you initially navigate faster in the structure of our Studio, take 2 minutes:

1. Game Clients & Patches:
- High-Five: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=6472
- Classic 1.0: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=5836
- Classic 1.5: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=6473
- Ertheia: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=6357
- Infinite Odyssey: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=6358
- Underground: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=6462
- Helios: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=7155

2. Forum threads & bug report section:

- High-Five: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/forumdisplay.php?f=97
(Before submitting a bug report, we recommend reading the next thread: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=5336)

- Classic 1.0/1.5: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/forumdisplay.php?f=111
(Before submitting a bug report, we recommend reading the next thread: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=5453)

- Ertheia/Infinite Odyssey/Underground: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/forumdisplay.php?f=100
(Before submitting a bug report, we recommend reading the next thread: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/showthread.php?t=3830)

- Geodata: http://forum.l2-scripts.ru/forumdisplay.php?f=102

3. Technical support skypes:

- Urchika  (L2-Scripts Manager, Yury): Change IP binding, additional services request, technical support extension and other financial questions.

- talesofwar (L2S-Guard Manager): Questions regarding configuration and usage of the gameserver protection (L2S-Guard).

- l2-scripts (L2-Scripts Technical Support): Critical bug report and other questions regarding the work of the gameserver.
